text: People who doodle while listening retain more information.
The word 'Buddha' means 'one who is awake'.
The CIA once ran a mind-control program called MK-Ultra.
The first computer bug was a real moth stuck in a computer relay.
Python was named after Monty Python, not the snake.
Humans are more likely to remember emotionally charged events.
Area 51 was only officially acknowledged by the US government in 2013.
